I did open an issue concerning a test suite to run https://github.com/iRASPA/RASPA2/issues/12, I suggest that I will include some tests once this has been resolved.
(so far, the recipe just runs `simulate -h`)
That is a good strategy to make all test pass!
Is there a `make check` we can run here?
